flawed_nl_solution:
The entire sq ft of the living room is LxW so the room is 16x20 = <<16*20=320>>320 sq ft
Tom has already put down 250 sq ft so he needs to put down 320-250 = 100 sq ft of flooring
The boxes contain 10 sq ft of flooring per box and he needs 100 more sq ft of flooring so he needs 100/10 = <<100/10=10>>10 more boxes
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 100. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
